body: It seems more natural to move the images folder setting from the preferences dialog to the download dialog. Rename the download dialog to [Card] Images Manager (or something). Display available free space for selected drive.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Move card images folder setting to download dialog.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on August 21, 2014 14:31:36_

It seems more natural to move the images folder setting from the preferences dialog to the download dialog. Rename the download dialog to [Card] Images Manager (or something). Display available free space for selected drive.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=658_
